Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
hms.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
The Inventory class manages a collection of medications in the hospital management system. It provides functionalities to add, remove, update, and retrieve medications, as well as loading from and saving to a CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()

  • Method Details

    • addMedication

      public void addMedication(Medication medication)
      Adds a medication to the inventory. Sets the stock level alert based on the current stock and low stock alert level.
      Parameters:
      medication - The Medication object to add.

    • removeMedication

      public boolean removeMedication(String medicationName)
      Removes a medication from the inventory based on its name.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the medication was removed; false otherwise.

    • updateStockLevel

      public void updateStockLevel(String medicationName, int quantity)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication to update.
      quantity - The new stock level quantity.

    • getMedication

      public Medication getMedication(String medicationName)
      Retrieves a medication from the inventory based on its name. Loads the inventory from the CSV file before searching.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Medication object if found; null otherwise.

    • getMedications

      public List<Medication> getMedications()
      Retrieves the list of all medications in the inventory.
      Returns:
      A list of Medication objects.

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV(String filePath)
      Saves the current inventory to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path where the inventory should be saved.

    • loadFromCSV

      public void loadFromCSV()
      Loads the inventory data from a CSV file. Clears the current list before loading.

    • checkLowStockAlerts

      public void checkLowStockAlerts()
      Checks for medications that are below their low stock alert level and prints an alert message.
